Created an attachment (id=48268)
modified RenamePackageTests.java

On line 765, put caret after "ResourcesPlugin." and press Ctrl+Space.

The proposal for the 'class' field of every type does not have a declaring type. Any code assist invocation on a type will reproduce.

Fixed > 20060821
